item.title: Create My First 24/7 Telegram Bot On Python
item.description: Hello! What this post is about So today I am going to write about how I (1) created my first Telegram bot on python, and (2) manage to host it 24⁄7 for free. The reason I am writing this is because I had encountered some issues while looking for a beginner tutorial teaching me how to write telegram bots. And after writing the bot, I wanted my bot to be live without having me to pay for anything.
